title: Teen wounded in accidental shooting near rec center
content:
HUNTSVILLE, AL (WAFF) -
Huntsville police were called to investigate a shooting off Alaska Avenue Tuesday evening.
Officers were called to an area near a recreation center there just before 6 p.m.
Police said a boy pulled a gun from his waistband and it went off.
A bullet grazed the shoulder of a teenage girl. She was treated at the scene.
No one was taken into custody.
